name: Supercook Ready Rolled Marzipan 400G
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>DirectionsBefore unrolling the marzipan, gently warm with the heat of your hands to prevent cracking.Thinly cover the cake with smooth apricot jam.Carefully and slowly unroll the marzipan.Lift plastic sheet and drape the marzipan over the cake.Gently peel away the plastic sheet.Smooth into position using the palm of your hand, working from the centre to the edges and down the sides.Trim away any excess marzipan using a sharp knife.For best results allow to dry for 24 hours before icing with Dr. Oetker Ready Rolled Regal-Ice White Icing if desired.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: 40 extra points on any Betty Crocker icing or frosting
Messages: <Messages>      <Message TypeCode="ShortShelfLife" PageReference="http://www.tesco.com/groceries/zones/default.aspx?name=baking&icid=bakingzone_MM" Description="Let's get baking, click here for all of your baking ingredients and recipe inspiration">        <Stores all="true" />      </Message>      <Message TypeCode="BulkBuyLimit" TriggerQuantity="99" GroupId="NOT_MAPPED" Description="Sorry, there is a limit of 99 on this product">        <Stores all="true" />      </Message>    </Messages>
